#Text= Aang says : " On stage , when you said I was just like a ... brother to you , and you did n't have feelings for me .

column1: #Text=" Katara says : " I did n't say that .
#Text=An actor said that .
#Text=" Aang says : " But it 's true , is n't it ?
#Text=We kissed at the Invasion , and I thought we were gon na be together .
#Text=But we 're not .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , I do n't know .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why do n't you know ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Because , we 're in the middle of a war , and , we have other things to worry about .
#Text=This is n't the right time .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , when is the right time ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , I 'm sorry , but right now I 'm just a little confused .
#Text=" Katara says : " I just said I was confused !
#Text=I 'm going inside .
#Text=" Aang says : " Ugh , I 'm such an idiot !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Here 's what you missed ... we went to the Fire Nation , and you got better , and Katara was the Painted Lady , and I got a sword , and I think Combustion Man died .
#Text=Oh , look , the Invasion 's about to start !
#Text=Shhh !
#Text="
